juisynth.logic

Class Operator

  • java.lang.Object
    • juisynth.logic.Operator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SignalSource

    public class Operator
extends Object
implements SignalSource
    Operator defines the implementation of a synthesizer component, consisting of an oscillator, a spectrum filter and an ADSR envelope.
    Author:
    juicyp

      • loadPatch

        public void loadPatch(Patch patch)
        Loads the settings for oscillator, spectrum filter and ADSR envelope contained in the provided Patch-object into the fields of this particular instance of Operator.
        Parameters:
        patch - A patch containing the settings for an operator.
